short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful product hunting tool for Daraz providing tools that need to succeed in a highly competitive marketplace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of spending hours scrolling through endless pages of products on Daraz only to come up empty-handed? Introducing Sellerdash, the Daraz Product Hunting Tool â€” your one-stop solution for all your product hunting needs.

With our advanced search filters, you can quickly narrow down your options and find exactly what you're looking for in no time. Simply enter your desired keywords, choose your preferred price range, and select any additional specifications to find the perfect product.

But that's not all - our tool helps you compare prices across different sellers to ensure you're getting the best deal possible. Plus, with the ability to save your searches and favorite products, you can easily keep track of your options and make an informed decision.

Say goodbye to endless scrolling and frustration, and say hello to the Daraz Product Hunting Tool. 

As a free member, you will have access to the following features:

Search Products by Keyword

One of the standout features of our Daraz Product Hunting Tool is the ability to search for products using keywords easily. Whether you know exactly what you're looking for or you have a general idea, our tool allows you to find the products that match your search criteria quickly.

Our advanced search filters allow you to narrow your options even further, so you can find the perfect product. Simply enter your desired keywords, choose your preferred price range, and select any additional specifications to fine-tune your search.

With this feature, you can save time and effort by quickly finding the products you need without sifting through pages of irrelevant options. 

Product Analysis

You can analyze products using product data. With our tool, you can easily view important information about a product, such as its price, ratings, and seller information, to make an informed decision.

This feature allows you to compare prices across different sellers to ensure you get the best deal possible. You can also view the ratings and reviews left by other customers to gauge the quality of a product and make a more informed purchase.

Additionally, our tool provides detailed seller information, including the seller's ratings and return policy, so you can confidently buy from trusted sellers. With this feature, you can make informed and confident purchasing decisions on Daraz. 

Trends on Google

You can find trends of keywords using Google Trends. With this feature, you can easily see a keyword's popularity over time and identify any potential trends.

This can be incredibly useful for finding products currently in high demand and identifying new and upcoming products that may be worth considering. By staying on top of the latest trends, you can make more informed purchasing decisions and find products that are likely to sell well.

To use this feature, simply enter your desired keyword, and our tool will automatically pull data from Google Trends to show you the trend over time. This information can be incredibly valuable for both buyers and sellers on Daraz. 

Profit & Revenue Calculator

The tool has the inclusion of a calculator for calculating revenue. With this feature, sellers on Daraz can easily calculate their potential earnings from a product and make more informed decisions about which products to sell.

To use this feature, simply enter the price of a product, the number of units you plan to sell, and any additional costs (such as shipping and taxes) to see your potential earnings. You can also compare the potential earnings of different products to see which one is likely to be the most profitable.

This feature can be incredibly useful for sellers on Daraz, as it allows them to quickly and easily evaluate the potential earnings of a product and make informed decisions about which products to sell. 

Inventory of Products

You can easily find the products which users are looking for. With a user-friendly interface and advanced search functionality, users can easily search for products by name, category, price range, and other criteria to find the products they need.

Each product in the inventory has detailed information, including the number of units sold and the profit margin for each sale. This information can be helpful for users to track the performance of their products and make informed decisions about their inventory. 

Additionally, the inventory is regularly updated to ensure that users always have access to the most up-to-date information about their products.


Exact Sale of Seller

This feature allows sellers to see exactly how many units of each product have been sold and the total revenue generated from those sales. This information can be helpful for sellers to track the performance of their products and make informed decisions about their inventory and pricing.

Additionally, the exact sales feature provides sellers with detailed information about the customers who have purchased their products, including their names, addresses, and contact information. This can be useful for sellers to build relationships with their customers and provide them with excellent customer service.
Download Sellerdash today for FREE! We provide round-the-clock support, so if you have any questions or needs, please contact us at support@sellerdash.pk
